brief: This is a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) analyzer.

methods.name: analyze()
methods.desc:
Calculates the current frequency spectrum of the audio input 
 signal.

methods.name: analyzeSample()
methods.desc: Calculates the frequency spectrum of a given audio sample.

methods.name: input()
methods.desc: Define the audio input for the analyzer.

description:
This is a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) analyzer. It calculates the normalized
 power spectrum of an audio stream the moment it is queried with the analyze()
 method.
name: FFT

parameters.name: bands
parameters.description:
number of frequency bands for the FFT. This parameter needs to 
            be a power of 2 (e.g. 16, 32, 64, 128, ...). The default is 512.
